ej,powev101,P,berrc103,Fighting ej,batte101,P,berrc103,Fighting Vic Power came up swinging after being tagged by Earl Battey; both benches cleared; Power and Battey ejected by HP umpire Charlie Berry

ej,hardm101,C,drumc901,Call at 1B ej,tannc101,P,drumc901,Call at 1B Chuck Tanner and Indians Coach Mel Harder ejected by 1B umpire Cal Drummond
$Vic Power has now hit in 20 consecutive games
ej,richp101,M,runge901,Call at 2B Orioles Manager Paul Richards ejected by 2B umpire Ed Runge who said that Marv Breeding was off the bag at 2B
$39 minute rain delay
$Jimmy Piersall's throw to 3B late, Breeding to 2B; Rocky Bridges threw to 2B but the ball went in CF
$Dave Nicholson trapped off 1B
$Ted Williams' 512th homerun, moving him past Mel Ott into third place, behind Babe Ruth and Jimmie Foxx

ej,pierj102,P,stevj901,Arguing call at second $After Piersall was safe on his bunt, he saw 2nd base momentarily uncovered and tried for it; catcher Foiles had returned the ball to pitcher Bunning who was startled but threw to shortstop Fernandez in time to get Piersall who objected violently to the call and was immediately ejected by 2b umpire Stevens
ej,pierj102,P,drumc901,Called third strike Jim Piersall ejected by HP umpire Cal Drummond
Debut game for Ty Cline

$Indians pitcher Jim Grant and bullpen coach Ted Wilks got into a racial argument during the singing of the National Anthem; Grant left the stadium without notifying Indians manager Jimmy Dykes, who suspened Grant for the rest of the season without pay
